title: Earthquake
description: Mitigation strategies for earthquakes focus on reducing structural damage and improving preparedness in earthquake-prone areas.

title: Flood
description: Flood mitigation aims to prevent or reduce the impact of floods on communities through infrastructure and early warning systems.

title: Hurricane/Typhoon
description: Hurricane mitigation involves preparedness measures to reduce damage caused by high winds and storm surges in coastal areas.

title: Drought
description: Drought mitigation focuses on conserving water and promoting sustainable agricultural practices in regions prone to water scarcity.

title: Wildfire
description: Wildfire mitigation strategies aim to reduce the risk of fires through land management, public awareness, and rapid response systems.

title: Tsunami
description: Tsunami mitigation involves creating coastal defenses, evacuation plans, and early warning systems to minimize loss of life.

title: Volcanic Eruption
description: Volcanic eruption mitigation focuses on monitoring active volcanoes, creating hazard maps, and developing evacuation plans.

title: Landslide
description: Landslide mitigation strategies aim to reduce slope instability and minimize the risk of damage in landslide-prone areas.
